entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • isPartial check in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbolBase.MakeModifiers is not verified by tests #55825
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Tab indentation gives formatting false positive #55818
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • When pasting a comment that was copied and then pasted doesn't work #55816
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • ConvertNamespaceCodeFixProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #55815
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unity 2017 / .NET 3.5 records support #55812
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-By Design, untriaged
  • No Warning or Error notification after enabling IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) when method is Obsolete or from an Interface. #55810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • FastUpToDate check always failed on VS2022 with RunAnalyzersDuringBuild=false #55808
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Roslyn Compiler Service is forcing unneeded GCs, wasting CPU time #55807
    Bug, Area-Compilers
  • Typing operators cannot complete the selected items for types with overloaded operator #55806
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • the compilerOptions of /optionexplicit- not work #55803
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Closed

  • Generate class (in the same file) doesn't work with file-scoped namespaces #54746
    help wanted, Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, New Language Feature - File Scoped Namespaces, Backlog
  • wpf net6 textbox: string literals get mangled using net 6 but not net 5 #55672
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-Fixed
  • Analyzer crashes since Visual Studio 2022 Preview 3 #55611
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-Fixed, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • Analyzer host process fails to load analyzers correctly when building in parallel #52177
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Feature Request, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • String interpolation or concatenation is wrong in .NET 6 #55763
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • Interpolated String Concatenation in .NET 6 is incorrect #55809
    Resolution-Duplicate, Area-Compilers
  • Evaluate if we want to report more specific errors in place of ERR_DuplicateAlias/WRN_DuplicateUsing for scenarios involving conflicts in Global Usings #52625
    Bug, Language-C#, Area-Compilers, New Feature - GlobalUsingDirective, 17.0
  • Name lookup for top level (local) functions #45208
    Area-Compilers, Feature Specification, 17.0
  • Addition of a synthesized override of object.GetHashCode() in records not aligned with the latest design #45602
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Feature Specification, New Language Feature - Records, 17.0
  • [EnC] Roslyn reports active statement from last break session on hot reload #54347
    Bug, Area-Interactive, 17.0.P4
  • Visual Studio 2019 - account settings not working #55792
    Resolution-External, untriaged
  • Visual Studio 2022 Changes Refactoring Order #55636
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Introduce local doesn't use var keyword #55698
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, Resolution-Not Reproducible, Investigation Required, 17.0

Updated

  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    Area-Compilers, Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, 17.0
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Area-Infrastructure, Test, Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Test, Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Area-Interactive, Test, Flaky, Disabled Test, Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
    Bug, Area-Interactive, Test, Disabled Test
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, 17.0
  • need some more documentation about source generators #55753
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Deconstruction should not warn on tuple name mismatch #48974
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Types of fields declared in tuples are bound before the fields are cached in _lazyDeclaredMembersAndInitializers #51204
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples, 17.1
  • C# Syntax Explainer Tool #43488
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Need Design Review, Backlog
  • Move to namespace screws up document formatting #54889
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, Developer Community, 17.0
  • Quick Info representation for flow analysis annotations #38358
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Need Design Review, IDE-IntelliSense, IntelliSense-Quick Info, Backlog
  • PrintMembers method in record is unused #52421
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, New Language Feature - Records, Concept-Design Debt, 17.1
  • Followup on interpolated string error reporting for overload resolution errors #54396
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, 17.1
  • IOperation support for interpolated string handler conversions #54505
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, 17.1
  • Support function pointers in `typeof` in Attributes #48765
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Feature - Function Pointers, Compiler.Next
  • Should Roslyn or SDK provide a mechanism to enable/disable some/all source generators? #55518
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix Hot Reload active statement remapping #52100
    Interactive-EnC, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0.P4
  • Inheritance Margin tooltip polishing #54454
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • Debugger stepping into pattern matching #52586
    Area-Compilers, Feature Request, Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Using property marked with MemberNotNullWhen to a NotNull value doesn't get rid of the warning #55664
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.0
  • Roslyn should have an ETW/EventPipe source that we can use to report data #54770
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • IVT error CS0122 could be more detailed #55600
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Diagnostic Clarity, untriaged
  • Switch case after `or` pattern does not match #55668
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, 17.0
  • Exhaustiveness check quacked on nested deconstruction #55719
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Switch with falltrough cases and assignment of a variable #55754
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-By Design, untriaged
  • Language services crashed when editing .NET Runtime project #55794
    Area-Compilers, 4 - In Review
  • Garbage base clause causes compiler crash #55797
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 4 - In Review, 17.0
  • Tool to help locating C# global code causing CS7022 for the real Main() #54950
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Simple Programs, untriaged
  • IDE0130 message "Namespace 'Foo' does not match folder structure, expected 'Foo'" #55550
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • String interpolation produces incorrect output for concatenated strings #55569
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, 17.0
  • Enable breakpoints on branching expressions (conditional and short-circuiting) #43092
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-Debugging, Feature Request, Area-Interactive, Backlog
  • IDE0079 false positive for IDE0032 using *in-class* `SuppressMessageAttribute` #55529
    Bug, help wanted, Area-Analyzers, 17.0
  • Hang in Inline-Rename when there are errors in the method #55140
    Bug, Area-IDE, Area-Performance, 17.0
  • IDE0005 is not reported if a code have same name extension methods. #54283
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Re-add support for "Surround generated code with #region" option #4939
    Bug, Area-IDE, Backlog
  • Nullability information is wrong for lambdas in certain situations #55254
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.0
  • [Inheritance Margin] Don't get the margin for items from metadata #53375
    Bug, Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Inheritance Margin, 17.1
  • [Inheritance Margin] No way to trigger the margin via the keyboard #53373
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Inheritance Margin, 17.1
  • Overload resolution fails in complex scenario with Delegate overloads and extension methods #55691
    Area-Compilers, 17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #55829
    Area-IDE
  • Report an error for a misplaced `::` token. #55828
    Area-Compilers
  • Directly reference theme keys #55827
    Area-IDE
  • Dealing with more than one parameterless constructor #55824
    Area-Compilers
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Dev/dibarbet/rps reverts4 #55822
    Area-IDE
  • Dev/dibarbet/rps reverts3 #55821
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Dev/dibarbet/rps reverts2 #55820
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Dev/dibarbet/rps reverts #55819
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • Relax the induced GC strategy in ServerDispatcher #55814
    Area-Compilers
  • Bulk update project when several documents change #55813
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55805
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • EnC - Test mixed declaration in deconstruction #55804
    Area-IDE, Interactive-EnC

Merged

  • Fix generate type with file-scoped namespaces #55826
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use directory-scoped ALCs to load analyzers in .NET Core #55098
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Run dotnet-format on Roslyn #55679
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Switch to installing/uninstalling nuget packages in the BG instead of the UI thread #55671
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Drop active statements when exiting break mode #55773
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, 17.0.P4
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #55811
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Split 'generate default constructor' in a codefix and coderefactoring #55801
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Create a test help for writing simpler metadata tests #54891
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55785
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE
  • Change preview pane to hide unusable options #55775
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously (part 2) #55687
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously - and use in 'add nuget reference' code action #55759
    Area-IDE
  • Add an option to let user could change the position of Inheritance Margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Consider MatchPriority when comparing CompletionItems when filter text is lowercase only #55562
    Area-IDE
  • Use document with partial semantic for completion #55745
    Area-IDE
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • 🐇 Ensure recoverable syntax trees are pushed to temporary storage #55399
    Area-IDE
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55796
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trigger refactoring if the cursor is put on single field or event syntax node #55523
    Area-IDE
  • Fix support for "Usings inside namespaces" in various places #55795
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typing in rename preview changes #55774
    Area-IDE
  • Use lambda expression and method group signature in type inference #55786
    Area-Compilers
